rukus.text: Qul 'Inni La 'Amliku Lakum Đarraan Wa La Rashadaan
Qul 'Inni Lan Yujirani Mina Allahi 'Ahadun Wa Lan 'Ajida Min Dunihi Multahadaan
Illa Balaghaan Mina Allahi Wa Risalatihi Wa Man Ya`si Allaha Wa Rasulahu Fa'inna Lahu Nara Jahannama Khalidina Fiha 'Abadaan
Hatta 'Idha Ra'aw Ma Yu`aduna Fasaya`lamuna Man 'Ađ`afu Nasiraan Wa 'Aqallu `Adadaan
Qul 'In 'Adri 'Aqaribun Ma Tu`aduna 'Am Yaj`alu Lahu Rabbi 'Amadaan
Illa Mani Artađa Min Rasulin Fa'innahu Yasluku Min Bayni Yadayhi Wa Min Khalfihi Rasadaan
Liya`lama 'An Qad 'Ablaghu Risalati Rabbihim Wa 'Ahata Bima Ladayhim Wa 'Ahsa Kulla Shay'in `Adadaan
